longBusinessSummary: Subros Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of thermal products for automotive applications in India. The company offers compressors; automotive condensers; heating, ventilating, and air conditioning systems, such as heaters, evaporators, and blower units; tubes and hoses; bus AC; driver cabin AC for railway engines; commercial and residential AC; transport refrigeration systems; truck cabin AC systems; and off-roader AC systems. It also exports its products. The company was incorporated in 1985 and is headquartered in New Delhi, India.
